snippet: In hopes of increasing security at the Super Bowl, the N.F.L. has released a list of items banned from Lucas Oil Stadium. So fans will have to leave their Frisbees at home.
abstract: In hopes of increasing security at the Super Bowl, the N.F.L. has released a list of items banned from Lucas Oil Stadium. So fans will have to leave their Frisbees at home.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS -- As at any major event, security is a top concern at this year's Super Bowl. It is an issue that should be taken seriously by everyone. But that doesn't mean there is no opportunity for humor.

headline.main: N.F.L. Says to Leave Mace and Sticks at Home
